a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: People living in countries with universal right to vote, World,
Based on the classification and assessment by Skaaning et al. (2015). It does not consider informal restrictions or
legal restrictions based on age, criminal conviction, incompetence, and local residency.
Data source: Skaaning et al. (2015); Gapminder (v6); HYDE (v3.2); UN (2022)
